Package com.Game

package com.Game
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Camera
    Every engine needs a camera! Important!
    Component<T>
    Generic abstract class = any class can override this.
    CreateNewLevelMenu
    The scene where we create a new level, or where we type the level name to import it.
    DataBaseHandler
    Class that stores all the methods needed for a completely working database.
    GameObject
    Core component for any engine.
    InfoScene
    Class for the level's info.
    KeyListener
    Takes care of the key events
    Level1Menu
    First Level Scene.
    Level2Menu
    Second Level Scene.
    Level3Menu
    Third Level Scene.
    Level4Menu
    Fourth Level Scene.
    LevelEditorScene
    This is the Editor Scene where we can create levels.
    LevelScene
    This is the playable Level.
    MainMenuScene
    This is the Main Menu
    MouseListener
    Extends Mouse adapter -> Window events registered, keeps track of mouse events.
    OptionSelectMenu
    The scene where we select whether we want to create a new level, or to edit an existing one...
    PanelGUI
     
    Renderer
    Should take care of drawing objects relative to the camera or the zIndex.
    Scene
    Abstract class for the scene
    Window
    Implements runnable because it is easier to stop/start a thread than pausing an execution.
